kevin drumm.title: The Playing With Trucks single
kevin drumm.about:
Awhile back, woke up to the sound of a million trucks going down the street right outside my window. Must have been 10 miles long. It sucked. So, in a "if you can't beat them, join them" kind of way, I played along. Recorded using a phone,computer and trucks.I'm pretty sure everyone needs this!

 Cover model: The annoying guy I see at the grocery store almost everyday.

kevin drumm.title: Fortification Spectrum
kevin drumm.about:
Recorded in front of nobody, Chicago, Il, Never 2017.



Information: Pulses/Spectral filter/Brillo Pads/Tunnels/Hubert Airy/The Observable Universe/Ocular Migraines

trackinfo.title: Fortification Spectrum
trackinfo.lyrics:
I turned around, looked straight into a light bulb, rubbed my eyes and then I saw this rainbow-like zig zag pattern forming in my vision. As real as your iphone you keep looking at.  It kept growing. Panic ensued, a new experience. I couldn't get help from Google because  this thing was getting in the way of my vision enough so I couldn't even read the computer screen. Thought I was having a stroke. After an hour it went away. 
Phew.

kevin drumm.title: The Whole House
kevin drumm.about: 'Location' recordings in the homestead captured with a moody Radio Shack CTR-112 cassette recorder that randomly decides what speed it wants to play or record at, a real piece of crap.
